name: Principle Capital Holdings
overview: Principle Capital Holdings S.A. (PCH) is a holding company of a group established to raise and manage investment funds. The Company has three divisions: Activist Investment Funds business, Alternative Investment Funds business, and Fund and Trust Administration business. The Activist Funds include Principle Capital Investment Trust Plc (PCIT), the Companyâ€™s open-ended fund, Principle Capital, LP, which was launched in May 2007. The Alternative Investment Funds business includes the South African realestate fund, South African Property Opportunities Plc. In May 2007, PCH added PME African Infrastructure Opportunities Plc and Principle Energy to its portfolio of products. The Fund and Trust Administration business, referred to as Silex, provides administration services to over $1.7 billion of client assets, including five listed funds and several new unlisted funds. It also has a pipeline of new fund administration and private client mandates.
